programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: The murder of a gender-nonconforming Black teenager remains unsolved despite pressure from family and friends - raising issues about the increase of violence, and the lack of justice for trans murder victims across the country.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: Years after the body of a young woman is found strangled to death in a creek bed, law enforcement finally closes the case; a closer look raises questions about the investigation.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: On a remote island, a dispute between two lobstermen is settled the way islanders do: face-to-face; the conflict turns deadly when one swings an ax - leaving locals to dispute whether the death was self-defense or murder.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: In November 1959, four members of the Clutter family are brutally murdered in their home in a small Kansas farming community.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: Kansas law enforcement survey the aftermath of the seemingly unmotivated crime, while criminals Perry Smith and Richard Hickock go on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: Detailing the resulting investigation and convictions of Perry Smith and Richard Hickock, along with the ensuing media coverage.

programme.title: Cold Blooded: The Clutter Family Murders
programme.desc: As Perry Smith and Richard Hickock face a death sentence, Truman Capote's coverage of the infamous case and his ensuing novel, "In Cold Blood," spawns the modern American True Crime genre.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Charles "Lucky" Luciano teams up with Meyer Lansky and Bugsy Siegel in New York, and during prohibition, he makes a fortune.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Charles "Lucky" Luciano gains power in the New York underworld during prohibition; when two bosses start a mob war, Luciano plans to kill them both.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: "Lucky" Luciano takes over the mob, organizing the Five Families, but as his power increases, so does interest from the Feds.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: "Lucky" Luciano decides to go into the prostitution business, but it gives Thomas Dewey the opportunity to arrest him and put him on trial.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: "Lucky" Luciano is found guilty of running a prostitution ring, and is imprisoned; Vito Genovese becomes acting boss.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: As World War II begins, Charles "Lucky" Luciano is asked to aid the military in the invasion of Sicily; Dewey considers allowing Luciano to fight.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Luciano takes over Vito Genovese's heroin ring in Italy; Genovese and Gambino plot against mob leadership.

programme.title: The Making of the Mob: New York
programme.desc: Vito Genovese and Carlo Gambino make their move; when Genovese becomes a liability, Luciano must choose his successor.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: The town of Adel, Ga., is rocked by a brutal robbery homicide, and locals quickly point to an outsider as the killer; over 20 years later, new evidence raises the startling question if an innocent man is serving life for another man's crime.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When a beloved chiropractor in Sauquoit, N.Y., dies suddenly under strange circumstances, investigators discover she's been murdered with a rare poison; the killer could only be someone she knew closely, and the case divides the town.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A young woman in St. Augustine, Fla., with everything to live for is found shot to death with the gun belonging to her boyfriend, a deputy sheriff; he says it was suicide, but her family believes it was murder.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When an immigrant couple who settled in the Tennessee town of Cookeville is executed in their sleep and their house set on fire, investigators identify a suspect with motive; in their rush to make an arrest, they may have gotten the wrong man.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: In rural Shelbyville, Ky., a body is found in the river; years go by until the police catch the killer, but some in town question if the suspect is even capable of committing the crime.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: When a 22-year-old dancer goes missing, the men of the neighboring town who frequented the club she worked at become the suspect pool; wealth and status may protect a killer; a determined police officer works the case.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: After a woman is found shot in her bathroom, officials launch a death investigation to determine if it was suicide - as her husband claimed - or murder; years later, the case remains open, and the town still has questions.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A young single mother disappears without a trace; an investigation suggests she abandoned her children, while her family spends years proving she was murdered and finding her killers.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A man claims he shot his daughter's estranged husband, Chirstian Griggs, in self-defense; after investigators close the case, Christian's family discovers evidence that the killing was not justified.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A beloved town doctor perishes in a deadly house fire - which investigators conclude was arson; aut after securing a murder conviction, the prosecutor doubts his own evidence, and joins the fight to free an innocent man.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: Cold case investigators, looking into a shocking double murder, elicit a series of confessions from a group of teens; years later, the teens recant their statements.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A criminal defense attorney, known for uncovering corruption, finds himself on trial; accused of a complex murder-for-hire plot, along with eight others, he fights to clear his name and show the many holes in the state's case.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A couple is found brutally murdered in their home; investigators learn that the last person to see them alive had secrets of his own; some question whether prejudice led police to arrest the wrong man.

programme.title: True Crime Story: It Couldn't Happen Here
programme.desc: A dentist is brazenly killed by a masked gunman; the media reports salacious details as investigators uncover a sinister plot led by the dentist's wife and stepson; a private investigator shares a startling alternate theory.

programme.title: Butchers of L.A.
programme.desc: In the late 1960s and early 1970s, law enforcement discover a pattern of murdered hitchhikers and young men; their investigation lead them to an unassuming aerospace engineer, who lives a double life as a sadistic killer.
